title: Jesus x Dogs
sinopse:
Tsugei Shirou is a regular videogame-loving high school boy. However, the class president Harigaya suddenly approaches him to ask, "Will you become my dog?" What a question! Tsugei swears that he'll never get along with Harigaya, but in the end, what will become of these two and their adventures?!

(Source: Fallen Syndicate)
